item.title: Stupid question...But,

item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

this on my server

is that anyway possible or no? my server is silabsoft compatable this is what I got in my client.java for it and nothing appears…

int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); String owner = "Mod Mupe"; String LU = "None"; String ver = ""; String owner1= "Mod Leo"; sendQuest("@red@MupeScape v2"+ver, 15894); sendQuest("@whi@"+players+" @red@players currently online", 15895); sendQuest("@red@Future Update: @whi@"+LU, 15897); sendQuest("@red@Server Owner: @whi@" +owner, 15898); sendQuest("@red@Co-Owner: @whi@" +owner1, 15899); sendQuest("@red@Current Level: @whi@" +combat, 15900); sendQuest("@red@Health:@whi@"+playerLevel[3], 15901); sendQuest("", 15896); sendQuest("", 15902); sendQuest("", 15903); sendQuest("", 15904); sendQuest("", 15905); sendQuest("", 15906);
